metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3982 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
include/tests_webservers in Lynis before 1.5.5 on AIX allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/lynis.##### file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3982` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lynis - 1.5.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lynis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1').
